extent: doctors in kuwait have already said the six men and one woman are in good shape, so they may not have to stay in germany very long
Sentence: seven former p . o . w . s are getting one step closer to home. they 'll be arriving at ramstein air base in germany a few hours from now. once doctors there say they are good to go , the seven will head stateside. doctors in kuwait have already said the six men and one woman are in good shape , so they may not have to stay in germany very long. the former p . o . w . s were rescued sunday about 75 miles north of baghdad. they 've been sticking close together ever since. medical officers say they became a team while in captivity and want to stay together as a team until it 's time to go to their separate homes .
